summary: Building a Nigeria-focused betting/trading web app with user accounts, payments (data and bills), and differentiated trading features like secure chat, verified badges, and in-chat escrow.
known_issues: User reports they can’t log in to their account (login failure details unknown).

existing_features.title: Add frontend pages/components for a trading chat experience: thread creation (select a counterparty by Principal text), thread list, and chat detail view with message composer and message list.
Display a “Verified Trader” badge in the chat UI wherever a participant identity is shown (e.g., header/participant chip), based on verification status fetched from the backend.
Implement in-chat escrow UI inside the chat detail view: create escrow, view escrow status timeline, and perform allowed actions (fund, release, cancel) with clear confirmations and error handling.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the new Trading Chat + Escrow UI and enforce it consistently across the new pages/components (without changing app functionality).

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow website account creation with email and password
Support buying mobile data across networks in Nigeria
Implement a secure, authenticated 1:1 trading chat system in the backend, where only the two chat participants (and admins) can create/read messages for a given chat thread.

Add a transaction escrow model in the backend that is created and managed from within a chat thread, including escrow lifecycle actions (create, fund, release, cancel) with strict authorization based on chat participants.

Expose a backend query that allows the frontend to determine whether a given principal should display the “Verified Trader” badge, using the app’s verification source of truth (existing KYC verification).

projectName: Add secure trading chat with Verified Trader badge and in-chat escrow
